body:
I am able to replicate the error of the first post.
```
self.x_input = tf.placeholder(tf.float64, [None, self.n_input])
self.x = utils.binary_noise(self.x_input, self.is_training)

```
As I change "None" for 100 everything works fine.

> InvalidArgumentError (see above for traceback): Shape [-1,2000] has negative dimensions
